item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Hello üëã

Welcome to my blog.

You can play some background music at the bottom while you explore my work and thoughts.

You can use the search bar or the tags to find what you’re looking for.

The goal of this blog is to share my knowledge on Software Engineering subjects and learn even more while doing so.

Everything here will reference sources so that you can go deeper if you want to.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Giou

Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, interested mainly in Go, System Design and Blockchain.

  • Go / K8s / GCP
  • Rust / Solana
  • System Design & Back end
  • Postgresql, Firestore

Working on

  • Notification System using Go, Google Cloud Platform.
  • Risk Mitigation for Liquidity Provision on Orca CLAMM, Solana.

Find me on

  • GitHub: https://github.com/giou-k
  • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/konstantinos-georgiou-giou/

Other interests

  • Nutrition
  • Economics
  • Sports but mainly Boxing. Takes most my remaining energy after work üòµ‚Äçüí´.
  • Music (Jazz, Classic, House, Techno, Electro, Hiphop, and more) ‚ô¨‚ô™
